channel.title: How to make a killer PB&J sandwhich
channel.description:
Ok, the is my first tut, so if it sucks i am sorry :'(
ok here it is. how to make a peanut butter and jelly sandwhich!!
k first.. [code] you get two pieces of bread...2 not 1 not 3 2!! 2 damn it! [/code] then [code] you get the 2 pieces of bread get out a butter knife, and a spoon(i use these, you can use any utensil you wish) [/code] ok, then the hard part!!! [code]get out the peanut butter, and the jelly!!!!![/code] almost done!! [code] use the butter knife (or other utensil) and get out some peanut butter...spead it evenly over 1 piece of bread.[/code] after doing that.. [code]get the spoon(or other utensil) and put the jelly over the other piece of bread, EVENLY!![/code] last [code] put piece1 on piece2, and eat[/code]
incase you don't know what a pb&j sandwich is..here is mine XD [img]http://img73.imageshack.us/img73/2855/pbjaa7.png[/img] I hope you all loved the tutorial! :) feedback appreciated[br][size=1]Posted at: July 13, 2006, 01:20:11 PM[/size][hr]omg 14 views and no replies, leechers >.>

item.title: How to make a killer PB&J sandwhich
item.dc:creator: @fredric_da_third fredric da third
item.description:
@fredric_da_third wrote:

[quote=“Evil_, post:1, topic:4869”]Ok, the is my first tut, so if it sucks i am sorry :’(

ok here it is. how to make a peanut butter and jelly sandwhich!!

k first…

you get two pieces of bread...2 not 1 not 3 2!! 2 damn it!

then

you get the 2 pieces of bread get out a butter knife, and a spoon(i use these, you can use any utensil you wish)
ok, then the hard part!!!

get out the peanut butter, and the jelly!!!!!

almost done!!

use the butter knife (or other utensil) and get out some peanut butter...spead it evenly over 1 piece of bread.
after doing that…

get the spoon(or other utensil) and put the jelly over the other piece of bread, EVENLY!!

last

 put piece1 on piece2, and eat

incase you don’t know what a pb&j sandwich is…here is mine XD

I hope you all loved the tutorial! feedback appreciated[br][size=1]Posted at: July 13, 2006, 01:20:11 PM[/size][hr]omg 14 views and no replies, leechers >.>[/quote]

rofl now thats funny you learn somthing new every day!
just interested has anyone tried a crisp sandwich!! they are my favourite, you should try

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a killer PB&J sandwhich
item.dc:creator: @pimjong pimjong
item.description:
@pimjong wrote:

It’s peanut butter jelly time, peanut butter jelly time, peanut butter jelly time

(Chorus:)
Where he at 4x
There he go 4x
Peanut butter jelly 4x
Do the peanut butter jelly, peanut butter jelly,
Peanut butter jelly with a baseball bat 2x

(Chorus)

Now, break it down and freeze 4x

(Chorus)

Now tic tac toe (uh-huh)
Tic tac toe (let’s go)
Tic tac toe (you got it)
Tic tac toe (let’s ride)

(Chorus)

Now, freestyle, freestyle, freestyle, freestyle, freestyle, your style 2x

Where he at 4x
There he go 4x

And find the song + videoclip:
http://www.ebaumsworld.com/flash/peanutbutter.html

Read full topic
